question: A muslim woman wants to make amends for marrying a Christian man.
answer:
QUESTION
I am a divorced Muslim woman has married a divorced Christian man. My family is against our union. How can I make amends without losing my husband?
ANSWER


Share:
Your marriage to this man is invalid. You will just have to accept that marriage to a non-Muslim is prohibited.

If he accepts Islam, you may marry him otherwise this union is an adulterous union.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
